isis.stitle: Electrical System Troubleshooting Guide - BE 200, CE 200, CE 300 Model - LIGHT SYSTEMS - Lamp Monitor - EXTENDED DESCRIPTION

svcproc.title: EXTENDED DESCRIPTION
svcproc.para: Power is supplied from the power source of the specific light to the light monitor. When the circuit is complete (good ground connection and no burnt out bulbs) the specific lights will function properly and the corresponding light the in the light monitor will illuminate.
When a light is not functioning properly, the corresponding light in the light monitor will not illuminate.
